description: This file is a header file for the 'DobbySpecGenerator' class, which appears to be responsible for generating specifications (likely JSON-based) for container or runtime environments. It includes method declarations for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other runtime configuration aspects, indicating its role in setting up or managing runtime containers or sandbox specifications.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating runtime specifications, likely in JSON format, for containerized applications or services, based on application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates a JSON specification based on application configuration and runtime configuration, outputting the JSON string.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variables section of the spec based on application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mount points configuration for the spec.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK plugins section in the spec.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates Minidump plugin configuration.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates App Service SDK plugin configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates bind mount configuration with source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on application configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates system memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates GPU memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves CPU core allocation or configuration.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates classic plugins section in the spec.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethan log plugin configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates Multicast socket plugin configuration.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ion memory plugin configuration.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount configuration.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKPS mounts.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a tmpfs (temporary filesystem) mount.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount point.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Gets the working directory for the runtime environment.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON configuration.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds a hole punch port to the JSON specification.
